LanguageData.FirstSummerWarning:
Summer has begun! But winter is coming.

Your food crops won't grow in the winter cold. Be sure to store several days' worth of food now, while you still can.

You can build a walk-in refrigeration room to prevent food from spoiling.

And try to buy, steal, or make some parkas, or you'll freeze when you step outside.
LanguageData.RelationsBrokenDown: Forholder til {0} har brutt ned. De er nå fiendtlige mot deg.
LanguageData.RelationsWarmed: Forholder med {0} har varmet opp. De er ikke lenger fiendlige mot deg.
LanguageData.RelationsBrokenCapture: Fordi du fanget {0}, er nå {1} din fiende.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitRain: Et {0} kortsluttet i regnet og har started en brann.
LanguageData.AreaRevealed: Et nytt område har blitt avslørt.
LanguageData.AreaRevealedWithMechanoids: A new area has been revealed. It contains ancient, hostile mechanoids.
LanguageData.RoofCollapsed: Et tak har brutt sammen fordi det hang for langt unna noen støtte.
LanguageData.RecruitSuccess: {0} klarte med hell å rekruttere {1} ({2} sjanse).
LanguageData.BirthdayChronological:
It's {0}'s chronological birthday today! Biologically, {1} is {3} years old.

Chronologically, {1} just turned {2}.

Note that since people don't age while in cryptosleep, chronological birthday is separate from biological birthday.
LanguageData.NewDisease: {0} ble syk ({1}). Pass godt på at {0} får riktig behandling og tilbringer så mye tid i seng som mulig for å komme seg til igjen.
LanguageData.NewPartDisease: {0} fikk {1}infeksjon. Pass godt på at {0} får riktig behandling og tilbringer så mye tid i seng som mulig for å komme seg til igjen.
LanguageData.AncientShrineWarning: As {0} draws near the ancient wall, a sense of foreboding overcomes HIM. HECAP isn't sure why, but HE feels that this dusty structure may contain great danger.
LanguageData.AnimalManhunterFromDamage: A {0} is attacking after being harmed!
LanguageData.AnimalManhunterFromTaming: A {0} is attacking due to a taming attempt!
LanguageData.AnimalManhunterOthers: Other {0}s nearby have also become enraged!
LanguageData.LetterFriendlyTrapSprung: {0} has accidentally sprung a trap and taken damage from it.
LanguageData.LetterHealthComplications: {0} has developed a health condition: {1}\n\nThis was as a complication from: {2}.
LanguageData.LetterLeadersDeath: Leader {0} of faction {1} has died and been replaced by {2}.
LanguageData.LetterFamilyMembersRaidEnemy:
There are family members of your colonists or prisoners in the arriving group of {0}.

Keep in mind that even though they are related, they will still attack each other because of their bad factions relations.

The family members are:
LanguageData.LetterFamilyMembersRaidFriendly: There are family members of your colonists or prisoners in the arriving group of friendly {0}:
LanguageData.LetterFamilyMembersNeutralGroup: There are family members of your colonists or prisoners in the arriving group:
LanguageData.LetterFamilyMembersTraderShipSlaves: The orbital trader is selling family members of your colonists or prisoners:
LanguageData.FamilyLetterAppendedTextColonist: NAME is a family member of a colonist. HECAP is {0}'s {1}.
LanguageData.FamilyLetterAppendedTextPrisoner: NAME is a family member of one of your prisoners. HECAP is {0}'s {1}.
LanguageData.LetterAffair: {0}, married to {1}, has begun an affair with {2}.
LanguageData.LetterNewLovers: {0} and {1} have come together and are now lovers.
LanguageData.LetterNoLongerLovers: {0} and {1} are no longer in a relationship.
LanguageData.LetterAcceptedProposal: {1} has accepted {0}'s marriage proposal.\n\nAt some point in the coming days or seasons, they will have their marriage ceremony and invite all the colonists. Consider placing a marriage spot if you want to control where the ceremony occurs.
LanguageData.LetterRejectedProposal: {1} has rejected {0}'s marriage proposal. {0} is going to be unhappy about this.
LanguageData.LetterBondedAnimalDied: {0}, bonded to {1}, has died. It will affect {1}'s mood.
LanguageData.LetterNamedBondedAnimalDied: {0} named {1}, bonded to {2}, has died. It will affect {2}'s mood.
LanguageData.LetterBondedAnimalDiedMulti: {0} has died. It will affect mood of the following people:\n\n{1}
LanguageData.LetterNamedBondedAnimalDiedMulti: {0} named {1} has died. It will affect mood of the following people:\n\n{2}
LanguageData.LetterNewParty: {0} is throwing a party! Everyone who goes will gain joy and social energy, and a lasting positive mood boost.
